analysis.description:
ServusToken.balances (/unique_chucks/25/0x359a46571d4bc22a6a9310038b51e2d91163412f.sol#178-180) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/25/0x359a46571d4bc22a6a9310038b51e2d91163412f.sol#266-294)
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/25/0x359a46571d4bc22a6a9310038b51e2d91163412f.sol#371-400)
	- mint (/unique_chucks/25/0x359a46571d4bc22a6a9310038b51e2d91163412f.sol#405-422)
	- importPresaleBalances (/unique_chucks/25/0x359a46571d4bc22a6a9310038b51e2d91163412f.sol#438-450)
TokenSale.isContract (/unique_chucks/25/0x359a46571d4bc22a6a9310038b51e2d91163412f.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0x359a46571d4bc22a6a9310038b51e2d91163412f.sol:
	Contract ServusToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0x359a46571d4bc22a6a9310038b51e2d91163412f.sol#220-221)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

	External calls:
